ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide

Class ParticipantGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.ParticipantGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifeGuideAPI

    public class ParticipantGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements LifeGuideAPI
    A used to generate Participant objects, which random responses for each of the attributes in a given TrialDefinition.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Liam de Valmency (lpdv1g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Aleksandar Botev (ab9g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Dionisio Perez-Mavrogenis (dpm3g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Kim Svensson (ks6g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticipantGenerator

        public ParticipantGenerator(TrialDefinition trialDefinition)
        Constructs a ParticipantGenerator object. Using this class as an object ensures that the generated participants are stored in an internal list.
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The trial on which to base the participant generation.

    • Method Detail

      • getParticipant

        public Participant getParticipant(int id)
        Specified by:
        getParticipant in interface LifeGuideAPI
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the requested participant.
        Returns:
        the participant with the specified ID. If no participant with that ID is stored in this ParticipantGenerator instance, and the ID has already been used (i.e. it is less than the current value of the ID generator), this returns null. Otherwise, participants are generated and stored until the requested ID is reached, and that participant is returned.

      • getNewParticipant

        public Participant getNewParticipant(TrialDefinition trialDefinition)
        Generates a new participant for a given trial, stores them, then returns them.
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The trial in which to generate a participant.
        Returns:
        A new participant, with random responses for each of the specified trial's attributes.

      • generate

        public static Participant generate(TrialDefinition trialDefinition)
        Returns a statically generated participant for a given trial. Equivalent to getNewParticipant(TrialDefinition), but does not store the generated participant.
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - he trial in which to generate a participant.
        Returns:
        A new participant, with random responses for each of the specified trial's attributes.

      • setStartID

        public static void setStartID(int startID)
        Set the value of the ID generator. Generated participants will be allocated IDs starting at this value, incrementing by one for each generated participant.
        Parameters:
        startID - The value on which to start the ID generator (i.e. the ID given to the next generated participant).
